resources.string: This action will take you and your entire household out of this neighbourhood, If you are the creator of the neighbourhood, it will be inherited by the next in line. Are you sure you want to continue ?
Leaving a household will also take out of any neighbourhoods you are in, are you sure you want to continue ?
Are you sure you want to permanently delete the following item:
Are you sure you want to permanently delete this item?
Are you sure you want to permanently delete this image?
Are you sure you want to permanently delete this file?
This is a newly added image, you must first save the item before you can open this in the item gallery!
This is a newly attached file, you must first save the item before you can download and open this attachment!
Are you sure you want to remove this Box from your household?
You need to define a household, use the below QR code to be invited to an existing household or create your own from scratch !
You need to define a household before you can start establishing it's location !

Your home does not have an established geo location! \n\nIn order for you to be able to create or join neighbourhoods you will need to establish your home base by allowing the app to track your gps location for a while !
Your location is being tracked to establish your home base! \n\n This might take a couple days, be patient and keep your GPS turned on until the below progress reaches 100% !

A strong candidate location for your household has been located! \n\n Double check on the map that the location is correct and hit ACCEPT. If the location is incorrect you may hit RETRY to start the localizing process again !
Your household has not yet been located!

If the location is incorrect you can RELOCATE but keep in mind that relocating outside of a neighbourhood you previously joined will automatically remove you and your household from said neighbourhood !
Only the head of the household may locate or relocate the household !
You need to belong to a household with an established location before you can join neighbourhoods !
Your household doesn't belong to any neighbourhoods yet !
Your household belongs to the following neighbourhood(s):
You and your household may join existing neighbourhoods by invitation if your household falls within it's bounds. \nUse the below QR code:
Or you can create a new neighbourhood as long as it doesn't overlap with more than 2 existing neighbourhoods.
Only the household head can create new neighbourhoods !
Once you are happy with the neighbourhood geofence, provide a name and save the neighbourhood.

You are about to add the following person to your household. By doing this they will automatically gain access to all neighbourhoods your household is a part of and you will become their supervisor. \n\nPlease check and configure their permission levels below:

You are about to add the following person to your neighbourhood. By doing this, their household and all the members within will automatically gain access to the neighbourhood and you will become their supervisor. \n\nPlease check and configure their permission levels below:
Only people with established households can be added to neighbourhoods !
Scan the below QR code to download and install Neighbourly on the device of a friend or family member.
Or visit the app release page:
Your household doesn't have any boxes !
This content requires a specific permission which was not grante. Use the button below to review and grant missing permissions !
If you want to share this box with a household, have a member of the other household scan the below QR code with their app:
Alternatively you can share the below link that when used will allow anyone to open this Box:
This Box is being shared with the household:
Are you sure you want to permanently delete the Box sharing:
